[youtube]yQ1550cZ8i8[/youtube]


[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75024-0-1460806989.jpg[/img]

Hello~! ladies and gentlemen of skyrim.

it's my great pleasure to introduce my second mod.

I put in a A lot of effort into this L[/size][size=4]ovely[/size][size=3] clothing mod ;-)
I Hope you like it.

- Contents 
10 Types of Animal Pajama Light armor for male and female.
(bear, chicken, fox, frog, goat, milkcow, panda, pig, rabbit, tiger)

You can use, regardless of body-type. probably.


- How to get
Use Console : help pajama and player.additem
or
Use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]this super convenient mod[/url]

- look good with[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74228/?] adilette slippers[/url](my first mod!)

- kids can equip pajamas by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56670/?]this mod[/url]
  but there are some issues. hair clipping, incorrect skin texture.

[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/75024-0-1461255338.jpg[/img]
[/size]
author: Keung
